body_text:
It would be good to have guidelines in the docs like "use pure components where possible" and "watch out for these known issues". That provides a good source of truth and a better onboarding experience.
However, I think also putting comments next to the components reminding us of the hard to see problems of pure components in some areas would also be good. This would prevent people from changing them in the future during refactoring. It would also ease code review, so I stop asking dumb questions like this. 😄
